body.name: Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam, Full HD 1080p/30fps Video Calling, Clear Stereo Audio, HD Light Correction, Works with Skype, Zoom, FaceTime, Hangouts, PC/Mac/Laptop/Macbook/Tablet - Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 10 hrs 32 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: Webcam comes with a 3-month XSplit VCam license and no privacy shutter. XSplit VCam lets you remove, replace and blur your background without a Green Screen.
Full HD 1080p video calling and recording at 30 fps - You’ll make a strong impression when it counts with crisp, clearly detailed and vibrantly colored video. Cable length: 1.5 m
Stereo audio with dual mics - Capture natural sound on calls and recorded videos.
Advanced capture software – Create and share video content easily with Logitech Capture.
HD lighting adjustment and autofocus - The C920x automatically fine-tunes to the lighting conditions to produce bright, razor-sharp images even if you’re in a low-light setting.
body.description: Polished, Full HD video calls. The C920x Pro HD Webcam delivers remarkably crisp, clear and detailed images in vibrant colors. HD autofocus and light correction adjust to the conditions to provide consistently high definition, while the five-element glass lens delivers razor-sharp images. Dual mics placed on either side of the lens capture the natural sound of your voice. The 3-month XSplit VCam license enables you to remove, replace and blur your background. Whether for a key Skype call, to demo your skills or create your next YouTube video, the C920x ensures you make a strong impression.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Logitech HD Pro Webcam C920X Chat and Record Like A Pro Call, stream, blog and record like a pro in crystal clear HD video and audio. With spectacular video quality up to HD 1080p and dual built-in mics, C920X makes it a breeze to make your video presence stand out from the crowd. C920X comes with a free 3-month premium XSplit license.

High-Def Video Chat Connect with everyone in Full HD 1080p on Skype, or in fluid HD 720p on most popular video calling apps. Even chat with Facebook friends with video calling powered by Skype or Facebook Messenger. Full HD 1080p Video Recording Record vibrant HD 1080p video clips that capture the smallest details. Get fast, smooth uploads with less demand on your computer. Clear Stereo Audio Make sure everyone hears the real you. Two microphones, one on either side of the webcam, capture natural stereo audio. Premium HD Glass Lens The Full HD, five-element glass lens captures razor-sharp, clear images, while the premium autofocus adjusts smoothly and precisely to provide consistent high definition. Automatic low light correction Stream clear video, even in dim light. Video automatically adjusts to accommodate shadowy or harsh lighting conditions.

System Requirements Compatible with Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 or later, and most video calling applications Works in USB Video Device Class (UVC) mode with: macOS 10.6 or later (HD 720p on FaceTime for Mac or other supported video-calling clients; Full HD 1080p video recording with QuickTime Player), Chrome OS, Android v 5.0 or above (with supported video-calling clients), and USB port

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new web cam, this unit works very well. Easy to operate, super clear image and compact design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear and fast video. Does not pixelate on videos like lower priced cameras do
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera because my cameras which were not Logitech kept showing grainy images and could not keep up with many regular on cameras motions. I switched to Logitech because I trust the brand was tired of the cheaper products. I hooked up the camera and every problem that I was having went away! Love this camera. It costs more but worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and great picture quality
reviews.reviewText: Great little camera. Easy to hook up, easy to use, very good picture quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Upgrade Your Video Calls and Recordings with the Outstanding Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam
reviews.reviewText: As someone who has been using the Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam for a few months now, I can confidently say that it is one of the best webcams I have ever used. The video quality is simply outstanding, with crystal-clear visuals and vibrant colors that make my video calls and recordings look professional and polished.What I love about this webcam is its versatility. Whether I'm video conferencing with clients or streaming on Twitch, the C920x HD Pro Webcam always delivers exceptional performance. The automatic light correction and autofocus features ensure that my video feed always looks its best, even in low-light conditions.The setup process was also a breeze, thanks to the plug-and-play design of the webcam. I simply plugged it in, and it was ready to go within seconds. And with its sturdy design and easy-to-use controls, the C920x HD Pro Webcam is truly a joy to use.Overall, I highly recommend the Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam to anyone who is looking for a high-quality webcam that delivers exceptional performance and versatility. Whether you're a professional or a casual user, this webcam is sure to exceed your expectations and help you create high-quality content that looks amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera for Home office with Zoom Calls
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect camera for online virtual meetings and easily clips onto any monitor. Easy to move around on the monitor. Good buy for price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Clarity and Audio! Delivers Unbeatable Video Calling Experience!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam, and I am blown away by its exceptional performance! The Full HD 1080p/30fps video calling capability ensures that every video call is crystal clear and lifelike. Whether it's connecting with colleagues for virtual meetings or catching up with loved ones, the C920x delivers a seamless and immersive experience. The clarity is truly top-notch, capturing even the finest details with remarkable precision, making me feel like I'm right there with the person on the other end of the call.Another standout feature is the clear stereo audio. The built-in dual microphones capture my voice with impressive clarity and effectively reduce background noise, ensuring that my message comes through loud and clear. I no longer have to strain my voice or repeat myself during video calls. The audio quality is so good that it almost feels like having an in-person conversation. The webcam's automatic low-light correction is a fantastic addition, ensuring that I look my best even in dimly lit environments, further enhancing the overall video calling experience. I highly recommend the Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam to anyone in need of a top-tier webcam that delivers exceptional video and audio quality for all their virtual communication needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug and play flawless on Mac mini M2
reviews.reviewText: Giving this 5 stars across the board for the quality vs. price. Yes you can get better video and audio for more cash. I just needed something simple for work and apple FaceTime with my family. I couldn't be happier. I'm using a 2023 Mac mini running Mac OS Sonoma 14.2.1. I just plugged it in and it worked perfectly. I did read elsewhere that for the best connection, you should plug this webcam directly into the Mac mini and not into a USB hub. Not sure if that's true. Mine is plugged directly into the Mac mini with no issues. Hope this helps with us Apple users!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cam Only, not Speaker
reviews.reviewText: CAM is great, easy to install for a tech savvy. I was not sure how to set it up and I’m an average user of computers. I thought it would produce sound so those who are unsure, it does NOT produce audio— you have to purchase speakers as well. But the CAM is great.
